function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Elevated levels of resuspended particles in the room and within the convection flow","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implement effective ventilation and filtration systems, and regular cleaning and disinfection of surfaces","Technologies":"High-efficiency particulate air (HEPA) filters, ultraviolet germicidal irradiation (UVGI) systems, and air disinfection technologies","People":"Occupants of the built environment","Owner":"Building owners or managers"},{"Description":"Resuspended particles brought into the breathing zone of the occupants","Impact":"Higher likelihood of respiratory exposure to contaminants and pathogens","Mitigation":"Use of personal protective equipment (PPE) and regular cleaning of breathing zone surfaces","Technologies":"PPE (eg. masks), disinfectants, and surface cleaning protocols","People":"Occupants of the built environment","Owner":"Occupants themselves and building owners or managers"},{"Description":"Resuspended particles of respiratory origin calculated for specific settling velocities and dry density of nonvolatile species in saliva","Impact":"Potential for dissemination of respiratory pathogens and contaminants","Mitigation":"Enhanced ventilation and filtration, and cleaning protocols targeted at respiratory particle removal","Technologies":"Advanced ventilation and filtration systems, as well as targeted air purifiers and cleaners","People":"Occupants of the built environment","Owner":"Building owners or managers"}]}
